title: EACR 2025 Congress: Innovative Cancer Science, 16-19 June 2025.
abstract_text: Abstracts submitted to the 'EACR 2025 Congress: Innovative Cancer Science', from 16-19 June 2025 and accepted by the Congress Organising Committee are published in this Supplement of Molecular Oncology, an affiliated journal of the European Association for Cancer Research (EACR).
